conversation-text:
Pip: Ah, on the ground, scraps of material from Ripely's dress. She left us a trail.
Harry: Like a haberdashery Hansel and Gretel!
-
Pip: She has left a trail of nudity stunned men!
Harry: Like a naturist Hansel and Gretel!
-
Pip: She is leaving a new trail to follow!
Harry: Like a maritime Hansel and Gretel!
Pip: Will you LEAVE IT with the Hansel and Gretel comparisons!
Harry: Like a silent Hans-
Pip: SHUT UP!
